penis.transformationDescription:
"Letting out an involuntary moan, [npc.name] [npc.verb(feel)] [npc.her] penis shifting into a new form, and [npc.sheIs] hit by a wave of overwhelming arousal as [npc.her] shaft grows erect and the head smoothes over.
" "[npc.She] now [npc.has] an [style.boldHyena(naga penis)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.penisFullDescription].
"
[npc.She] [npc.has] [style.boldHyena([npc.ballsCount]#IF(npc.isInternalTesticles()) internal#ENDIF balls)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.ballsFullDescription(true)], which produce [npc.cumColour(true)] [style.boldHyena(cum)].
